title: Bolton take Tyler Walker on loan from Nottingham Forest
description: Tyler Walker has joined Bolton Wanderers on loan from Nottingham Forest until the end of the season.
content: The 21-year-old has made 16 appearances for Forest this season, most recently as a second half substitute against Arsenal in the FA Cup.Walker is the son of former England international Des, and made his first team debut in March 2015.The Trotters have already signed Everton duo Antonee Robinson and Harry Charsley on loan, during this month's transfer window.Walker could be in line to make his debut for Bolton this Friday, when they entertain Bristol City at the Macron Stadium, a match being broadcast live on Sky Sports.Get Sky Sports from Â£18 a month and watch the latest transfers live in action for their new teams
